title: I NEED HELP HIDING A LINK [QUICK $$$] [EASY JOB]
snippet: I have a streaming video website for movie trailers, and I would like to hide the links to prevent any competitors from grabbing them. I am using JW player as my video player. I need to hide the link in the source code, AND on Google Chrome's inspect tool (network, console, etc.) - As an example you can view the website 123movies.to as they have JW player as well and can hide the link.
